IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package utilities :: Module time_series :: Class TimeSeries

Class TimeSeries

source code

A series of values taken at consecutive points in time.

The values may be scalars, column vectors, or Quaternion objects.

Each value may have a (co)variance associated with it.

Timestamps may be irregularly spaced but must be monotonically increasing.

Method Details

__init__(self, timestamps=None, values=None, variances=None)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct time series.

A time series can be constructed empty, or with initial values if passed to the contstructor.

Parameters:
  • timestamps - Times at which values were taken.
  • values - Either a length N array of scalars or other data types, an MxN column vector array, or a length N QuaternionArray.
  • variances - Variances, either a length N sequence of variances for scalar data, a NxMxM sequence of covariances for MxN column vector data, or an Nx4x4 sequence of covariances for quaternion data.
Overrides: object.__init__

__call__(self, t, returnVariance=False)
(Call operator)

source code 

Obtain the closest previous value to time t.

If returnVariance is True then the value and variance are returned.

add(self, time, value, variance=None)

source code 

Add a timestamped value to the data.

Parameters:
  • time - Time at which the value was taken.
  • value - Value to store. The value must support the __copy__ operation as used by the copy module.
  • variance - (Co)variance of the value. The variance must support the __copy__ operation as used by the copy module.

Property Details

dtype

Type of data in this time series.

Get Method:
unreachable.dtype(self) - Type of data in this time series.

timestamps

Array of times at which the values were taken.

Get Method:
unreachable.timestamps(self) - Array of times at which the values were taken.

values

Array of values of the time series in chronological order.

The returned array has shape (N) for scalars, shape (n, N) for vectors, or is a QuaternionArray of length N for quaternions, where N is the number of values.

Get Method:
unreachable.values(self) - Array of values of the time series in chronological order.

variances

The (co)variances of the values in chronological order.

The returned array has shape (N) if the values are scalar, (N, n, n) for vectors, or (N, 4, 4) for quaternions.

Get Method:
unreachable.variances(self) - The (co)variances of the values in chronological order.

earliestTime

The earliest time stamp in this time series.

Get Method:
unreachable.earliestTime(self) - The earliest time stamp in this time series.

earliestValue

The earliest value in this time series.

The latest time stamp in this time series.

Get Method:

The latest value in this time series.
